name: chromatix/phpcs-config-chromatix-no-wordpress
description: Like phpcs-config-chromatix, but without the rules for things that can only be used in the WordPress context.

post-install-cmd: sh -c 'if [[ $OSTYPE == linux* ]]; then php vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set installed_paths ../../wp-coding-standards/wpcs; fi'
sh -c 'if [[ $OSTYPE == darwin* ]]; then php vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set installed_paths ../../wp-coding-standards/wpcs; fi'
sh -c 'if [[ $OSTYPE == msys* ]]; then sh vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set installed_paths ../../wp-coding-standards/wpcs; fi'
sh -c 'if [[ -z $OSTYPE ]]; then sh vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set installed_paths ../../wp-coding-standards/wpcs; fi'
